changes: Initial release of the Bone View plugin.
Added toggleable view to visualize model armatures.
Implemented rendering of bones and axis helpers for each group.
Integrated the plugin with the Blockbench UI by adding a button to the 'View' menu.
Added a customizable hotkey (default: Shift+B) to toggle the Bone View.
Added a setting in 'Keybindings' to change the hotkey.
